name: getLocaleInfo
description: Returns a structure containing info to a specific locale. This function combines the locale functions `getLocaleCountry`, `getLocaleDisplayName`, and `getLocaleLanguage` to a single function.

params.name: locale
params.description: Geographic/language locale value, where the format is a combination of an ISO 639-1 code and an optional ISO 3166-1 code separated by a dash or an underscore.

examples.title: Get information about the page's locale
Output page's locale in a divergent language
examples.description: Outputs the language locale of the page in German.

examples.title: Output German locale in a page's language
examples.description: Outputs the German locale in the language defined for the page.
